front.title: IEEE Guide for a Detailed Functional Specification and Application of Static VAR Compensators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by 1031-2000. Guidelines for the application, protection, and ratings of equipment for the safe and reliable utilization of shunt power capacitors are provided. This guide applies to the use of 50 and 60 Hz shunt power capacitors rated 2400 Vac and above, and assemblies of capacitors. Applications that range from simple unit utilization to complex bank situations are covered.
